Hello,

I've been using version 1.2 for a project and recently had the need to add this same functionality to another project, so I grabbed version 1.4 and started using, but noticed that when performing the transform almost all the formatting is removed from the transformed file. I say almost because comments/commented nodes are still formatted properly. Version 1.3 does keep the formatting as well, so I'll use that for the time being.

Thanks for the great tool.

Hi,

Could you provide an example of formatting xml and transformation?
